title: How to Roast Cumin Seeds

steps.headline: Add cumin seeds in a small frying pan.
Keep stirring the cumin seeds to avoid charring with the help of the spoon.
Smell the fragrance of the cumin seeds.
steps.description: It indicates that the process of roasting has started and do not stop stirring the seeds.

steps.headline: Observe the change in the color of the seeds.
Roast them till they had acquired the dark brown color.
Turn off the gas stove immediately.
Remove the frying pan from it.
Place the seeds in a bowl.

text: Add cumin seeds in a small frying pan.  Turn on the gas stove.  Keep stirring the cumin seeds to avoid charring with the help of the spoon.  Smell the fragrance of the cumin seeds. It indicates that the process of roasting has started and do not stop stirring the seeds. Observe the change in the color of the seeds.  Roast them till they had acquired the dark brown color.  Turn off the gas stove immediately.  Remove the frying pan from it.  Place the seeds in a bowl.
sentences: Add cumin seeds in a small frying pan.
Keep stirring the cumin seeds to avoid charring with the help of the spoon.
Smell the fragrance of the cumin seeds.
It indicates that the process of roasting has started and do not stop stirring the seeds.
Observe the change in the color of the seeds.
Roast them till they had acquired the dark brown color.
Turn off the gas stove immediately.
Remove the frying pan from it.
Place the seeds in a bowl.
